articles.author: Mehul R Thakkar
articles.title: Adani Properties to redevelop Dharavi, Asia's largest slum cluster - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Dharavi, spread across 300 acre, is a hub of small-scale industries for medicines, leather, footwear, and clothing. Near Bandra Kurla Complex and south Mumbai.
articles.content: The Maharashtra government has given final approval to the appointment of Adani Properties for the redevelopment of Dharavi, Asia's largest slum cluster located in Central Mumbai, the financial capit… [+1644 chars]
